attributes.title: Bhagavad Gita Chapter 5 - www.LifeBliss.org
attributes.description: From the works of Enlightened Master Paramahamsa Nithyananda.  Nithyananda, lucidly speaks on Bhagavad Gita Chapter 5, titled, "Live All Your Dimensions".  Your potential is infinite. Stop choosing and start acting. Action needs to replace dilemma; only then can you explode in 360 degrees. Make a conscious decision and take a quantum leap into realizing your true potential. Drop all your fantasies and live in the now and here. This is the only way to live. Do not exclude anything from your life. When you exclude, you miss. Spirituality is always encompassing, never excluding. Stop excluding and discover your infinite dimensions! Complete 2.5 hour discourse may be found at www.AnandaGalleria.com
